alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe; Denver (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:45PM MDT until June 29 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ARAPAHOE...NORTHEASTERN DENVER AND SOUTHWESTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 445 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Aurora, or 15 miles east of Denver, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Denver, Aurora, southern Denver International Airport, Bennett, Watkins, Manila Village, Buckley SFB and Strasburg. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
